articles.title: SpaceX's Starship SN4 prototype passes another, tougher pressure test - Space.com
articles.description: A test flight could be just around the corner.
articles.content:
SpaceX's latest Starship
 prototype keeps passing tests, edging closer and closer to a highly anticipated test flight.
The SN4 vehicle, the latest pathfinder for SpaceX's Starship Mars-colonization spacecraft, aced a high-pressure and high-simulated-thrust … [+2771 chars]

articles.author: Roland Moore-Colyer
articles.title: Watch out, Zoom: WhatsApp is getting 50-person video calls - Tom's Guide
articles.description: WhatsApp will support 50-person video calls to take on Zoom and Google Meet
articles.content:
WhatsApp looks like its chasing after Zoom with its web app moving to support video calls with up to 50 people, effectively offering an alternative to Zoom, Google Meet, and Skype. 
The new video calling feature is currently in a beta version of the desktop … [+1812 chars]

articles.author: Tom Warren
articles.title: Microsoft’s Outlook on the web is getting a Gmail-like text prediction feature - The Verge
articles.description: Microsoft is working on a new email prediction feature for Outlook on the web. It’s very similar to Google’s Gmail Smart Compose feature, that predicts what you’re about to write in emails. A new send later email feature is also on the way.
articles.content: A new send email later feature is also coming soon

articles.title: How to choose between the new 13-inch MacBook Pro versus the 16-inch MacBook Pro - AppleInsider
articles.description: Don't pull the trigger on buying a fully-loaded 13-inch MacBook Pro just yet. At the higher end, there are cases where a 16-inch MacBook Pro will be a much better value.
articles.content:
Don't pull the trigger on buying a fully-loaded 13-inch MacBook Pro just yet. At the higher end, there are cases where a 16-inch MacBook Pro will be a much better value.

articles.description: The fully electric four-door 4 Series could be joined by a conventionally powered M4 Gran Coupe.

articles.title: NYT CEO Mark Thompson: Coronavirus is an opportunity to 'prove the value of trustworthy news' - CNN
articles.description: At a time when news organizations are reporting on and sharing vital information about the coronavirus pandemic with communities across the country, many are also struggling with a difficult business environment.
